meanings.definition: A small booklet or pamphlet containing information or advertising material.
meanings.sent1: I picked up a brochure about the zoo at the entrance.
meanings.sent2: She handed out brochures to promote the new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The brochure about the amusement park made me want to go on all the rides.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a brochure, full of bright and enticing promises.
meanings.sent5: The brochure for the vacation package painted a vivid picture of sandy beaches and clear blue waters.

meanings.sent1: They decided to brochure the upcoming event to attract more attendees.
meanings.sent2: He brochures for the travel agency every weekend.
meanings.sent3: I can brochure like a pro after years of practice.
meanings.sent4: Her words brochure through the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The company plans to brochure their new product launch across multiple platforms.
